title: Website Designer
description:
Job Description: 
We are looking for a talented and innovative website designer to join our team. As a website designer, your role will involve creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites. Your key responsibilities will include designing website layouts, selecting captivating color schemes, and developing captivating graphics and illustrations. A deep understanding of user experience (UX) design principles and proficiency in industry-standard design software are essential. Attention to detail and the ability to meet project deadlines are crucial. The ideal candidate will possess a portfolio exhibiting their previous website design projects.

Key Skills:
- Proficiency in using Adobe Creative Suite or Figma
- Strong knowledge of UX / UI principles
- Familiarity with responsive design
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

Hello, I'm Hooman, a self-taught product designer with a decade of experience in the design industry. I embarked on my career journey as a print job designer, where I honed my creative skills and developed a keen eye for detail. Over the past 5 years, I have focused on product design, working on complex projects, including fintech solutions tailored for the stock market.

As my passion for design grew, so did my entrepreneurial spirit. Currently, I proudly serve as the CEO of Modern Media, a dynamic digital agency based in Dubai. At Modern Media, we empower businesses to thrive in the digital landscape by delivering innovative design solutions and cutting-edge strategies. Under my leadership, our team leverages the latest technologies and industry best practices to create captivating user experiences and drive meaningful results.

Throughout my career, I have remained dedicated to creating exceptional user-centered designs that align with business objectives. I excel at translating ideas into reality, employing a holistic approach that encompasses research, prototyping, and meticulous attention to detail. With a deep understanding of design principles and emerging trends, I continuously strive to push the boundaries of what's possible in the digital realm.

As a CEO and product designer, I thrive on fostering collaborative partnerships, both within my team and with clients. I believe that true innovation arises from diverse perspectives and collective expertise. By fostering a culture of creativity, collaboration, and continuous learning, I aim to create an environment where every team member can flourish and deliver their best work.

I am passionate about sharing my knowledge and experiences, which is why I actively engage in industry events, conferences, and workshops. If you're interested in design, entrepreneurship, or simply want to connect, I'd be delighted to connect with you. Let's collaborate, inspire, and make an impact in the ever-evolving world of design.

Feel free to reach out, and let's explore the possibilities together!
